website_summaries.verdict: A high-end U-shaped sectional that's beautiful and functional. Worth the high price for consumers with flexible budgets.
pros: Gorgeous sectional sofa with a classic U-shaped configuration
Covered in quality genuine leather in choice of charcoal, driftwood, and saddle colors
Fits classic to contemporary home decor
cons: Very pricey, so it will be out of the range for some consumers

customer_reviews.title: Great couch, if I got the whole thing...
customer_reviews.text: Only half the sectional arrived, second try.....same issue. It’s been weeks and I’m still living with half the sofa. Love the half I have, would just really like the rest of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: SO IN LOVE! This is the perfect loveseat for our formal “adult hang out” room! Great quality and super comfortable. I love that the cushions Velcro to the back so they’re not constantly slipping or being pulled off by the non adults who will most likely try to take over this space 🤨 It took a while to get here, but was definitely worth the wait!! Now to add accent chairs and finishing touches!!
customer_reviews.author: amber pires

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was awful, sofa is great
customer_reviews.text: Great sofa, leather is soft and love color. The only issue was delivery, zero communication, I received 1 text that sofa would arrive on Tuesday Feb 18 from 12Am -12pm, well it never arrived, happened to check the update and it said rescheduled per customer - ummm not no one called, then it said new date Feb Monday Feb 25 9am -12pm, they basically arrived and just dropped it off in the boxes, until I asked can I inspect it and can you take the boxes, they did take the boxes, but I unpacked it and put it together, again no communication, thank god I checked for an update and took time off, lastly the delivery crew smelled horrible
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ptacek

customer_reviews.title: Looks as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly as pictured! Seems to be made of quality leather. We searched all over for a leather couch with a decent price and this one by far surpassed the others at this price. And it had free delivery to top it off!
customer_reviews.author: Kotton

customer_reviews.title: Great sectional
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with my new couch!! I was hesitant to purchase a couch with out seeing it in person, however I’ve been searching for a leather sectional with a chaise for quite some time and did not want to spend $10,000. This was exactly what I was looking for so after reading reviews about stone and beam I decided to go for it!! It looks and feels great and is super comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.author: JC7621

customer_reviews.title: Great value but not for me
customer_reviews.text: The sofa arrived in perfect condition and looked exactly as pictured. The cushions are not reversible as originally stated. My husband didn’t like the low seat backs. The leather felt a bit dry and as if it would scratch and stain easily. I ended up returning this sofa. However, I still feel like it’s a great value for a huge, stylish sectional. Shopping and returns were simple and painless.
customer_reviews.author: Shopmama

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Classy. Affordable.
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous. Best value. Tough. Love Stone and Beam. Always do the job right for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: What a great buy for our family room!
customer_reviews.text: We love this couch. Comfortable, perfect size for our setting and the color is perfect match to the pictures. I’d buy it again and recommend. Many guests have commented and asked about it. No cons so far.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great couch!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful couch! Takes a while to get but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Ursula putdoor

customer_reviews.title: Amazing ! Comfortable ! WOW
customer_reviews.text: I`m so in love with this ! it was worth it ! extremely easy to put together pretty much comes ready all you do it slip it next to each other . it's Gorgeous ! expensive look! everything a person who likes the best expects ! It came so well protected also, with no damage what so ever !
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Good ottoman
customer_reviews.text: The ottoman is very nice high quality. I have a black leather couch and the gray matches well. Seems study. Happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall Value!
customer_reviews.text: Very surprising quality. Thick leather and great style all for a really good price. Impressive overall value.
customer_reviews.author: Rh

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful soft ottoman!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful soft charcoal leather ottoman. Looks amazing and is extremely comfortable. Only drawback is the legs are a little short making the ottoman a little lower than we’d prefer.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: The Couch You're Looking For
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely stunning, well made, immediate sense of quality and comfort. Very soft, worth your money. Do not hesitate. Long shipping times but worth it when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Suleiman

customer_reviews.title: Wish we had it..
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but pretty sure we’re never going to get it. It’s been several months and still nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

product_meta.title: Amazon Brand – Stone & Beam Andover Right-Facing U-Shaped Sectional, 134"W, Saddle-Colored Leather
product_meta.description: Size:Right U-Sectional| Color:SaddleAn Amazon Brand - Complete your living space with this stylish sectional. With its saddle-colored upholstery, this sectional is an ideal accent for transitional-style home decor. The solid-wood frame enhances durability and extends this sectional’s life.
feature_bullets: Complete your living space with this stylish sectional. With its saddle-colored upholstery, this sectional is an ideal accent for transitional-style home decor. The solid-wood frame enhances durability and extends this sectional’s life.
Overall: 134"W x 96"D x 33"H; seat height: 21"H; seat depth: 25"D; seat back height: 28"H; arm height: 28"H; leg height: 4.25"H; chaise depth: 23"D; chaise width: 40"W
Sturdy wood frame with rich top-grain leather upholstery
Transitional style blends well with a variety of home-decor themes.
This item is made to order just for you.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars22 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
